purpose: To provide a comprehensive toolkit that enables developers to create and deploy AI agents that can interact with computer systems effectively.
principle: Surfkit is built on the principle of modularity, allowing developers to easily integrate various components and libraries to enhance AI agent functionality.
reusability: The toolkit promotes reusability by providing well-documented modules and components that can be easily shared and integrated into different projects.
limitations: As an alpha project, Surfkit may have incomplete features and limited stability. Users should expect potential bugs and a lack of extensive documentation.
name: surfkit
description: A toolkit for building computer use AI agents
highlight: Modular architecture enabling seamless integration of various AI components for building sophisticated agents.
